text: Nepal has been involved in many wars in its history. This list describes wars involving the historical Gorkha Kingdom as well as modern Nepal. ==Wars involving Nepal== * Bengali expedition into Nepal (1349-1350)Ahmed, ABM Shamsuddin (2012).
